plot: A Singaporean-Spanish boy goes on a journey to Barcelona to discover more about his mother after her untimely death. Along the way, he meets different people and finds a deeper meaning to life.
title: El gris perfecto
plot_es: A Singaporean-Spanish boy goes on a journey to Barcelona to discover more about his mother after her untimely death. Along the way, he meets different people and finds a deeper meaning to life.
plot_en: A Singaporean-Spanish boy goes on a journey to Barcelona to discover more about his mother after her untimely death. Along the way, he meets different people and finds a deeper meaning to life.
